WorkflowRule.name: WorkflowRule
WorkflowRule.description: Represents a workflow rule that is used to fire off a specific workflow action when the specified criteria is met. Includes access to the associated WorkflowRule object in Salesforce Metadata API.

FullName.description: The full name of the associated metadata object in Metadata API.

ManageableState.description: Indicates the manageable state of the specified component that is contained in a package: beta deleted deprecated deprecatedEditable installed installedEditable released unmanaged

Name.description: The enum name or ID of entity this rule is associated with.

NamespacePrefix.description: The namespace of the package containing the workflow rule object.

TableEnumOrId.description: The enum (for example, Account) or ID of the object for this workflow rule.
